from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(x, y)

```py
## my_notebook.ipynb

def my_lr_deployement(input_x):

    if isinstance(input_x, (int, float)):    ## check input type
        return model.predict([[input_x]])[0] ## prediction

    else:
        return None
```
